buffs.description: Increases the production speed of Elf guild unit by 7% per 5-star unit, 15% per 6-star unit. Applies in Time Shop, but can not exceed 150%.
buffs.name: Senior Instructor (Elf)

buffs.description: Drawing from the World Tree Energy, increases the number of stages skipped by Elf Secret and Legend of Ancient Forest by 1. World Tree Energy increases by 15 for every 5-star, 30 for every 6-star unit. (Applies in Time Shop, High Fairys World Tree Energy cannot exceed 900).
buffs.name: World Tree Blessing

hidden_abilites: At its first appearance, it increases the attack speed and movement speed of all ally units, and casts a shield that temporarily grants immunity against magical attacks.
Increases its movement speed and attack power by 10%.
Increases the movement speed and the attack range of all units by 6%, and the critical damage of all units by 5%.
Significantly increases attack power and critical hit rate against enemy crystal.
Senior Instructor(Elf) Limit Break : The production speed of Elf Guild Units affected by the Senior Instructor(Elf) increase up to 200%.
World Tree Blessing Limit Break : The max value of the World Tree Energy increases from 900 to 1,200.
description.skill1: Increase attack speed of elf unit in Guild Raid (1%, 2%, 4%, 6%, 8%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior High Fairy ]
